Job Title: Strategic Finance Director

Location: Carlsbad, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
About Us

One team. Global challenges. Infinite opportunities. At Viasat, we’re on a mission to deliver connections with the capacity to change the world. For more than 35 years, Viasat has helped shape how consumers, businesses, governments and militaries around the globe communicate. We’re looking for people who think big, act fearlessly, and create an inclusive environment that drives positive impact to join our team.

What You'll Do

Viasat has a diverse portfolio of fast-growing businesses with a range of strategic opportunities that require analysis, evaluation, and execution. The Strategic Finance team sits at the intersection of strategy, technology, and finance. This role will report to the Deputy CFO after a transition period during which it will report to the former head of Strategic Finance.

Strategic Finance works closely with leaders from across the company to turn ideas into tangible business plans with executable strategies that drive Viasat’s growth, in particular with Viasat’s Corporate Development and Strategy team to identify, evaluate, and execute strategic deals, including investments, acquisitions (M&A) and partnerships. Your analysis will help drive investment decisions in established and emerging markets, and you will have the opportunity to work directly with external partners and customers to support deal negotiations.

In this role, you will engage in an exciting array of high-value opportunities with significant access to key senior leadership. The role is fast paced, unstructured and involves working with executive leadership who make major strategic decisions based on the analysis performed by the Strategic Finance Director.

The day-to-day

Assist in the identification, evaluation, and execution of strategic opportunities. This role will be responsible for:Building detailed financial valuation models, including DCF, project NPV, sensitivity analyses, etc.Presenting to Viasat’s Executive Leadership Team and other senior leadersCollaborate with cross-functional teams to understand quantitative and qualitative drivers to financial and strategic evaluation


What You'll Need

7+ years of experience in a financial valuation modeling role such as investment banking, consulting, venture capital, private equity, corporate strategy, and/or corporate developmentAdvanced Excel modeling skills and a proven track record of creating complex valuation models that have been used to influence executive-level decisionsExperience presenting complex strategic business concepts to senior leadershipBachelor's Degree May require some international travel on a project-by-project basis


What Will Help You On The Job

A natural problem solver with a strong sense of curiosity and a track record of bringing strategic clarity to complex business questionsFascination with space and technology, with an interest in learning some technical conceptsSelf-starter mentality, with a willingness to independently identify and solve problems Strong sense of ownership, accountability, and high attention to detailComfortable openly sharing and debating ideas


Salary range

$159,400.00 - $277,000.00 / annually

At Viasat, we consider many factors when it comes to compensation, including the scope of the position as well as your background and experience. Base pay may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Additional cash or stock incentives may be provided as part of the compensation package, in addition to a range of medical, financial, and/or other benefits, dependent on the position offered. Learn more about Viasat’s comprehensive benefit offerings that are focused on your holistic health and wellness at https://careers.viasat.com/benefits.

EEO statement

Viasat is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, genetics, age, or veteran status or any other applicable legally protected status or characteristic. If you would like to request an accommodation on the basis of disability for completing this on-line application, please click here.

Experience Level (if available): None
